message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $180. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal for the value it provides.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $150?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we meet halfway at $165? This offer reflects the product's true value.
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I believe we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. Would it be possible to lower the price to $145?
